title: Easypromos Expands Social Media Promotions Offering for WSI Consultant Network
text:
The world’s largest digital marketing network gains access to most complete platform for creating multi-channel, digital promotions campaigns
Toronto, Canada
Easypromos, ( http://www.easypromosapp.com ) a global leader in social media promotions, and WSI, the world's largest network of Digital Marketing Consultants, announced a partnership which will provide WSI’s network of consultants access to Easypromos’ self-service, easy-to-use platform for creating and managing digital campaigns across any social media network or device.
WSI Digital Marketing Consultants specialize in helping small and medium-sized businesses realize their online marketing potential by leveraging world class Internet technologies and advanced digital marketing strategies As a WSI partner, Easypromos offers WSI Consultants access to its more than 18 social media promotions tools such as quizzes, surveys, contests and more to create online marketing campaigns that generate leads, engage with their community, conduct market research, drive consumers to point-of-sale and building consumer loyalty.
With Digital Marketing Consultants in more than 80 countries around the world, WSI’s network is well-matched with Easypromos’ global capabilities, which to date has supported more than 300,000 campaigns in more than 30 different languages worldwide. Further, WSI Consultants will not only be able to use Easypromos’ platform to help their current clients grow their business, but offer a competitive advantage when pitching prospective new clients with expanded digital marketing capabilities.
“We’re proud and honored to be chosen by WSI as a social media promotions partner for the WSI global network,” said Carles Bonfill, co-founder and chief executive officer of Easypromos. “Easypromos was built to make life easy for digital program administrators. Our intuitive platform will save WSI Consultant teams valuable time, simplify moderation, and afford robust, problem-free functionality with no programming expertise required. We look forward to working with WSI’s customers and deepening our global footprint even further.”
With Easypromos applications, WSI Consultants will have access to advanced features such as
 Triggered emails to reengage with entrants Team-centric user interface for multiple moderators Multichannel capabilities Tracking tools to measure source/referral of entrants Real-time editing capabilities 3rd party integration 100% responsive and mobile friendly platform CSS, HTML and JS design readiness Shareable across social networks and instant messaging apps
Mark Dobson, co-founder and chief executive officer of WSI, commented on the partnership: “We’re excited to add Easypromos to our exclusive and prestigious list of suppliers. It’s clear that Easypromos will supplement our consultants’ abilities in building multi-channel digital promotions campaigns. This access to more than 18 social promotions applications in 30 different languages will certainly enrich our international network of consultants’ position as full-service digital marketing agencies to brands all over the world.”
Easypromos offers a pay-for-promotions model, a subscription model for unlimited promotions, and package programs at discounted rate.
About Easypromos:
Easypromos is a global leader in social promotions offering a self-service, easy-to-use platform to create and manage digital campaigns seamlessly across any social media network or device. Launched in 2010, Easypromos has powered digital campaigns supporting contests, sweepstakes, quizzes, surveys, and more through simple, customizable solutions that are easily shareable for more than 250,000 promotions worldwide. Clients span 50 countries, with promotions running in 24 languages.
